definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
geocentric latitude (i.e. angle between the equatorial plane and straight line from center of the earth)

sentences.english: " Indeed, " Geocentric Adventure" is in theaters Not quiet.
sentences.chinese: 確實，《地心歷險記》的放映廳裏很不安靜。

sentences.english: Maintain an inquisitive mind and do not accept the status quo.
sentences.chinese: 保持一顆追根問底地心，不接受”現狀“。

sentences.english: The gravity enables us to live naturally on land.
sentences.chinese: 地心吸力讓我們能在陸地上正常生活。

sentences.english: Sheldon:Ah, gravity, thou are a heartless bitch.
sentences.chinese: 啊，地心引力，汝乃無良之婊子。
誰是第一個反對“地心說”的人？

sentences.english: Because of gravity, long flight would be exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 由於地心吸力，長途飛行會感到筋疲力盡。

sentences.english: The centre of the earth consists of an iron core, probably with some nickel mixed in.
sentences.chinese: 地心是鐵芯組成，可能還混有一些鎳。

sentences.english: Gravity is tugging on my eyelids.
sentences.chinese: 地心引力不懈地拖曳着我的眼皮。

sentences.english: The law of gravity describes and quantifies the attraction between two objects .
sentences.chinese: 地心引力法則描述和量化了兩個物體間的吸引力。

sentences.english: Slam dunking a basketball is a fight against gravity.
sentences.chinese: 扣籃是需要與地心吸力對抗。

sentences.english: It is believed that they were Extraterrestrial or Hollow Earth Children.
sentences.chinese: 人們認爲，他們是天外來客或地心孩子。

sentences.english: Youth surge & Anti-gravity cream is a golden combination.
sentences.chinese: Youth浪湧&反地心引力的奶油是一個金黃組合。

sentences.english: In art I want to be free from the earth’s gravitational pull.
sentences.chinese: 在攝影作品中，我想脫離地心引力。

sentences.english: When there is no gravitation , our feet no longer stay on the ground .
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有地心吸力，我們的腳就不能再站在地面上了。

sentences.english: Another wonderful story is that of Journey to the Centre of the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 凡爾納寫的另外一部小說叫做？《地心之旅》。

sentences.english: Ptolemy's geocentric theory has been taken as an example of a paradigm.
sentences.chinese: 托勒密的地心說已被認爲是一個範式例子。

definition: geographical position according to the principles of feng shui 風水|风水[feng1 shui3]/ley lines
pubic region/point two inches below the navel where one's qi resides
mind/state of mind/attention/(Chinese medicine) psychic constitution
fire and ice/combination of sharply contrasting or incompatible elements
